item.title: My post
item.description: /project/project1/ https://www.google.com I got my DJI Drone last week! Python list = [0,2,5,7,8,4] count = list[0] for i in list: if(count < i): count = i print("Max number is", count) ## Max number is 8 R code library(reticulate) py$list ## [1] 0 2 5 7 8 4 py$count ## [1] 8 library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union starwars %>% select(mass,height,species) %>% na.
